short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This detects infinite scroll, and keeps you away from these distracting websites with simple messages for your productivity.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Infinite scroll is getting popular, but is highly distracting. "No Infinite Scroll" will always show messages to stay away from them when you are on these websites. Thus, you can focus on what really matters to you while searching information on the web, where there is tsunami of information.
